author: Ed Monk
title: Trust bargain: buy Monks at a 10pc discount
text: History's lessons for investors on 'blue chip' share collapses Trust bargain: buy Monks at a 10pc discount Investment trust bargain of the week: Monks, the Â£841m trust, is being managed by a respected new team - but still trades at a big discount Calmer waters: Monks has new management after a choppy period. By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 8:38AM BST 25 Sep 2015
